context.p: This task describes how to refill a car's radiator with antifreeze coolant.

step.cmd: Tightly close the radiator's drain valve, and make sure any hoses are properly connected.
Refill the radiator using the manufacturer's recommended coolant type.
Inspect and/or replace the radiator cap as well as the expansion tank cap (if applicable).
Start the engine and observe the coolant level. Add more coolant if needed.
Inspect the area for any leaks while the engine is on and again later once the engine has cooled.
